articles.content: Princess Anne's ex-husband Captain Mark Phillips was spotted back at Land Rover Burghley Horse Trials again today with his rumoured new girlfriend as the pair cheered on his daughter Zara Tindall onc… [+6620 chars]

articles.title: Police forced to intervene as Chesterfield and Oldham fans fight in field near stadium - FanBanter
articles.description: Police were forced to intervene as Chesterfield and Oldham fans took fight in a field near the Boundary Park stadium on Saturday afternoon. A video along with photos have been uploaded showing just what went on, policing has been slammed while some claim the …
